name: Ludum Delivery v1.1 (post-compo)
description:
This game was originally released for LD42 Compo. I've added some enhancements to enhance playability and fixed some issues. This version is not to be evaluated for LD.

Original release can be found here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/ludum-delivery

This time, besides of the classic endless mode, I’ve included 100 Trucks mode. The challenge is to send 100 trucks without losing. You can even try a perfect game if you send 100 perfect trucks (completely filled).

Gameplay:

Changes:

  • Add I-shape 3x1 piece to facilitate making perfect trucks.
  • Add bonus multiplier each time a perfect truck is sent.
  • Changes in scoring system.
  • Changes in level progression.
  • Some adjustments in velocity for perfect trucks.
  • New PRNG algorithm for generating new pieces. It prevents too much similar pieces to be created in a  row.
  • Add some animations (score, levels).
  • Fix rare grid bug.
  • Add piece swapping with other in conveyor (D+A to enable).
  • M to toggle music.
  • S to toggle sound/sfx.
  • Polish menu & GUI.
  • P to toggle pause.
  • 100 truck mode.
  • New game over screen.
  • New controls screen.
  • Add click on indicator to send truck.
  • New menus.
